ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 22
ygData.msgSnippet: She s right:) Haven t seen many blatant steals at all since i ve been on Zek:) When and if it happens to me, i just get even by casting Fear.*lol*
ygData.messageBody:
She's right:)

Haven't seen many blatant steals at all since i've been on Zek:) When and if
it happens to me, i just get even by casting Fear.*lol*

Malvolin(Teir'dal Necromancer) Rallos Zek
Azalin(Human Shadowkight) Veeshan(until I get on my knees and BEG Verant to
move him to Zek.:)


-----Original Message-----
From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, May 16, 1999 5:46 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 22


>From: "Xillith ofNeriak" <xillith@...>
>
>HOW LAME
>
>Kill stealing, yawn. On Rallos Zek we get even instead of just shouting at
>each other. Try it, and you will see that this foolishness does not even
>exist.
>
>~Xillith, Lady of Pain
>SK12 DE on Rallos Zek
>

>>Evil or not, stealing kills is still an unacceptable way of playing EQ.
>>it happens, yes.
>>
>>But, make sure you talk things out first...I believed that someone tried
to
>>steal my kills once, instead, they thought I needed help. I was luring
>>things at the time. They apologize and it never happened again.
>>
>>Brethren, we may be Knights of the Shadows, but we are still Knights
>>nevertheless.
>>
